Pu-Jen Cheng received his Ph.D. in Computer Science at National Chiao Tung University in 2001. He went to the Institute of Information Science, Academia Sinica, as a Postdoctoral Fellow for more than four years. Starting from August 2006, he joined the department of Computer Science and Information Engineering faculty at the National Taiwan University, and also jointly appointed at the Graduate Institute of Networking and Multimedia, National Taiwan University. He is a member of the ROC Phi Tau Phi Scholastic Honor Society and the ACM/SIGIR.
